item.title: [bro] Hostile Negotiations
item.description:
Instant

Exile the top three cards of your library in a face-down pile, then exile the next top three cards of your library in another face-down pile. Look at the cards in each pile, then turn a pile of your choice face up. An opponent chooses one of those piles. Put all cards in the chosen pile into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. You lose 3 life.

https://www.youtube.com/shorts/kImRHHR0NoM

item.title: [bro] Gwenna, Eyes of Gaea
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Elf Druid Scout

{T}: Add two mana in any combination of colors. Spend this mana only to cast creature spells or activate abilities of a creature or creature card.

Whenever you cast a creature spell with power 5 or greater, put a +1/+1 counter on Gwenna, Eyes of Gaea and untap it.

https://twitter.com/aishawakatsuki/status/1588128816308064257

item.title: [bro] Fauna Shaman
item.description:
Creature — Elf Shaman

{G}, {T}, Discard a creature card: Search your library for a creature card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

https://bleedingcool.com/games/magic-the-gathering-the-brothers-war-exclusive-preview-card/

item.title: [bro] Titania's Command
item.description:
Sorcery

Choose two —

• Exile target player's graveyard. You gain 1 life for each card exiled this way.

• Search your library for up to two land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

• Create two 2/2 green Bear creature tokens.

• Put two +1/+1 counters on each creature you control.

item.title: [bro] Teething Wurmlet
item.description:
Creature — Wurm

Teething Wurmlet has deathtouch as long as you control three or more artifacts.

Whenever an artifact enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life. If this is the first time this ability has resolved this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Teething Wurmlet.

https://www.ausgamers.com/news/read/3643017/magic-the-gathering-the-brothers-war-exclusive-card-reveal

item.title: [bro] Cityscape Leveler
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Construct

Trample

When you cast this spell and whenever Cityscape Leveler attacks, destroy up to one target nonland permanent. Its controller creates a tapped Powerstone token.

Unearth {8}

https://twitter.com/Kiwion/status/1587873607581159428

item.title: [bro] Bladecoil Serpent
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Serpent

When Bladecoil Serpent enters the battlefield, for each {U}{U} spent to cast it, draw a card.

When Bladecoil Serpent enters the battlefield, for each {B}{B} spent to cast it, each opponent discards a card.

When Bladecoil Serpent enters the battlefield, for each {R}{R} spent to cast it, it gets +1/+0 and gains trample and haste until end of turn.

https://twitter.com/TheM4ng0/status/1587852273501216769

item.title: [brr] Adaptive Automaton
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Construct

As Adaptive Automaton enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.

Adaptive Automaton is the chosen type in addition to its other types.

Other creatures you control of the chosen type get +1/+1.

item.title: [brr] Aetherflux Reservoir
item.description:
Artifact

Whenever you cast a spell, you gain 1 life for each spell you've cast this turn.

Pay 50 life: Aetherflux Reservoir deals 50 damage to any target.

item.title: [brr] Blackblade Reforged
item.description:
Legendary Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature gets +1/+1 for each land you control.

Equip legendary creature {3}

Equip {7}

item.title: [brr] Astral Cornucopia
item.description:
Artifact

Astral Cornucopia enters the battlefield with X charge counters on it.

{T}: Choose a color. Add one mana of that color for each charge counter on Astral Cornucopia.

item.title: [brr] Bone Saw
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature gets +1/+0.

Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

item.title: [brr] Burnished Hart
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Elk

{3}, Sacrifice Burnished Hart: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

item.title: [brr] Caged Sun
item.description:
Artifact

As Caged Sun enters the battlefield, choose a color.

Creatures you control of the chosen color get +1/+1.

Whenever a land's ability causes you to add one or more mana of the chosen color, add one additional mana of that color.

item.title: [brr] Cloud Key
item.description:
Artifact

As Cloud Key enters the battlefield, choose artifact, creature, enchantment, instant, or sorcery.

Spells you cast of the chosen type cost {1} less to cast.

item.title: [brr] Chromatic Star
item.description:
Artifact

{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Chromatic Star: Add one mana of any color.

When Chromatic Star is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.

item.title: [brr] Defense Grid
item.description:
Artifact

Each spell costs {3} more to cast except during its controller's turn.

item.title: [brr] Door to Nothingness
item.description:
Artifact

Door to Nothingness enters the battlefield tapped.

{W}{W}{U}{U}{B}{B}{R}{R}{G}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice Door to Nothingness: Target player loses the game.

item.title: [brr] Elsewhere Flask
item.description:
Artifact

When Elsewhere Flask enters the battlefield, draw a card.

Sacrifice Elsewhere Flask: Choose a basic land type. Each land you control becomes that type until end of turn.

item.title: [brr] Foundry Inspector
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Construct

Artifact spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

item.title: [brr] Gilded Lotus
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Add three mana of any one color.

item.title: [brr] Ichor Wellspring
item.description:
Artifact

When Ichor Wellspring enters the battlefield or is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.

item.title: [brr] Helm of the Host
item.description:
Legendary Artifact — Equipment

At the beginning of combat on your turn, create a token that's a copy of equipped creature, except the token isn't legendary. That token gains haste.

Equip {5}

item.title: [brr] Inspiring Statuary
item.description:
Artifact

Nonartifact spells you cast have improvise. (Your artifacts can help cast those spells. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.)

item.title: [brr] Journeyer's Kite
item.description:
Artifact

{3}, {T}: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

item.title: [brr] Key to the City
item.description:
Artifact

{T}, Discard a card: Up to one target creature can't be blocked this turn.

Whenever Key to the City becomes untapped, you may pay {2}. If you do, draw a card.

item.title: [brr] Keening Stone
item.description:
Artifact

{5}, {T}: Target player mills X cards, where X is the number of cards in that player's graveyard.

item.title: [brr] Liquimetal Coating
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Target permanent becomes an artifact in addition to its other types until end of turn.

item.title: [brr] Mazemind Tome
item.description:
Artifact

{T}, Put a page counter on Mazemind Tome: Scry 1.

{2}, {T}, Put a page counter on Mazemind Tome: Draw a card.

When there are four or more page counters on Mazemind Tome, exile it. If you do, you gain 4 life.

item.title: [pw22] Psychosis Crawler
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Phyrexian Horror

Psychosis Crawler's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your hand.

Whenever you draw a card, each opponent loses 1 life.

item.title: [sld] Bonescythe Sliver
item.description:
Creature — Sliver

Sliver creatures you control have double strike. (They deal both first-strike and regular combat damage.)

item.title: [sld] Mesmeric Sliver
item.description:
Creature — Sliver

All Slivers have "When this permanent enters the battlefield, you may fateseal 1." (To fateseal 1, its controller looks at the top card of an opponent's library, then they may put that card on the bottom of that library.)

item.title: [sld] Synapse Sliver
item.description:
Creature — Sliver

Whenever a Sliver deals combat damage to a player, its controller may draw a card.

item.title: [sld] Magma Sliver
item.description:
Creature — Sliver

All Slivers have "{T}: Target Sliver creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of Slivers on the battlefield."

item.title: [sld] Thorncaster Sliver
item.description:
Creature — Sliver

Sliver creatures you control have "Whenever this creature attacks, it deals 1 damage to any target."

item.title: [sld] Belligerent Sliver
item.description:
Creature — Sliver

Sliver creatures you control have menace. (They can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

item.title: [bro] Carrion Locust
item.description:
Creature — Insect Horror

Flying

When Carrion Locust enters the battlefield, exile target card from an opponent's graveyard. If it was a creature card, that player loses 1 life.

item.title: [bro] Emergency Weld
item.description:
Sorcery

Return target artifact or creature card from your graveyard to your hand. Create a 1/1 colorless Soldier artifact creature token.

item.title: [bro] Gixian Infiltrator
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Human

Whenever you sacrifice another permanent, put a +1/+1 counter on Gixian Infiltrator.

item.title: [bro] Moment of Defiance
item.description:
Instant

Target creature gets +2/+1 and gains lifelink until end of turn.

Draw a card.

item.title: [bro] Trench Stalker
item.description:
Creature — Beast Horror

As long as you've drawn two or more cards this turn, Trench Stalker has deathtouch and lifelink.

item.title: [bro] Goring Warplow
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Construct

Prototype {1}{B} - 1/1 (You may cast this spell with different mana cost, color, and size. It keeps its abilities and types.)

Deathtouch

item.title: [bro] Conscripted Infantry
item.description:
Creature — Human Soldier

When Conscripted Infantry dies, create a 1/1 colorless Soldier artifact creature token.

item.title: [bro] Dwarven Forge-Chanter
item.description:
Creature — Dwarf Wizard

Ward—Pay 2 life. (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays 2 life.)

Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

item.title: [bro] Horned Stoneseeker
item.description:
Creature — Lizard

Menace

When Horned Stoneseeker enters the battlefield, create a tapped Powerstone token. (It's an artifact with "{T}: Add {C}. This mana can't be spent to cast a nonartifact spell.")

When Horned Stoneseeker leaves the battlefield, sacrifice a Powerstone.

item.title: [bro] Penregon Strongbull
item.description:
Creature — Minotaur

{1}, Sacrifice an artifact: Penregon Strongbull gets +1/+1 until end of turn and deals 1 damage to each opponent.

item.title: [bro] Over the Top
item.description:
Sorcery

Each player reveals a number of cards from the top of their library equal to the number of nonland permanent they control, puts all permanent cards revealed that way onto the battlefield, and puts the rest into their graveyard.

item.title: [bro] Roc Hunter
item.description:
Creature — Human Soldier

Reach

item.title: [bro] Tomakul Sparksmith
item.description:
Creature — Human Artificer

When Tomakul Sparksmith enters the battlefield, mill three cards. You may put an artifact card from among the cards milled this way into your hand. If you don't, put a +1/+1 counter on Tomakul Scrapsmith. (To mill a card, put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)

item.title: [bro] Blitz Automaton
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Construct

Prototype {2}{R} - 3/2 (You may cast this spell with different mana cost, color, and size. It keeps its abilities and types.)
